titulo: Cómo Analizar a las Personas, Dominio del Lenguaje Corporal, Psicología Oscura y Protección del la Manipulación 4 en 1 [How to Analyze People, Mastery of Body Language, Dark Psychology and Protection from Manipulation 4 in 1]
descripcion:
Discover how to analyze people, master body language, and protect yourself against the bombardment of dark psychology and manipulation in modern society.
Do you want to discover how to truly analyze and speed-read people? Do you want to master your own body language and read other people like a book? Do you want the exact techniques to protect against dark psychology and manipulation?  
We’re never truly taught the importance of body language, despite nonverbal communication (NVC) making up over 60 percent (some say up to 93 percent) of our communication. We’re also never taught how to discern between those who are trying to manipulate us using dark psychology and persuasion, and those who genuinely have our best interests at heart. Luckily, that is exactly what this book is designed to do.
In this book, I’ll teach you the step-by-step process of how to master body language and become an effortless people analyzer, while also making sure you know how to protect yourself and your loved ones from the constant stream of manipulators out there. 
Are you ready to take your emotional intelligence to levels you never believed possible?
Here’s a tiny preview of what’s inside:

Please note: This audiobook is in Spanish.
